articles.title: France top group, Portugal squeeze into last 16 after draw - SuperSport
articles.description: Two penalties from Cristiano Ronaldo helped holders Portugal squeeze into the last 16 of the European Championship after a 2-2 draw with France on Wednesday

articles.title: Apple legal worries grow as long-dormant French case moves ahead - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: A group of French startups joins a case that could change the way the tech giant runs its App Store.
articles.content:
PARIS  A French case against Apple that's been gathering dust for years could soon add to the tech giant's headaches.

articles.title: Euro 2020 recap: Portugal v France - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The spoils are shared in Budapest as the European titleholders and the world champions both progress from the 'Group of Death'.
articles.content:
Portugal and France draw 2-2 in a Euro 2020 Group F clash in Budapest.
France forward Karim Benzema jumps for joy after equalising from the penalty spot against Portugal in Budapest.

articles.title: Spain score five goals in European Championship match for first time with Slovakia mauling - Goal India
articles.description: See which player leads the goal-scoring charts at Euro 2021: Updated rankings and tiebreakers in the race for the coveted award.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Delta variant to account for 90% of new COVID-19 cases in EU: Agency - CNA
articles.description: STOCKHOLM: The Delta variant, identified for the first time in India, could account for 90 per cent of new COVID-19 cases in the European Union in the coming months, the bloc's disease control agency said Wednesday (Jun 23).
